com.siperian.sif.message

Class CastorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.CastorUtil

  • public class CastorUtil
extends Object
    Singleton utility class that supports the Castor Java-to-XML data binding.

    This is used by SiperianClient and the Siperian Hub request processor

    Castor Home

      • setMappingFilename

        public void setMappingFilename(String mappingFilename)
        Set Castor mapping file.

        Provide the name, without path. The getMapping method looks for the file in the following locations, in the order shown here: 1. File system 2. Classpath, using getClass().getClassLoader() 3. Classpath, using Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader()
        Parameters:
        mappingFilename - Name of mapping file (without path)

      • getMapping

        public org.exolab.castor.mapping.Mapping getMapping()
        Load the Castor mapping file.
        Returns:
        the Castor mapping object

      • resetMapping

        public void resetMapping()
        Set the cached Castor mapping file to null. The next call to addMapping(String, byte[]) reloads it

      • addMapping

        public void addMapping(String mappingResourceName,
                       byte[] mappingBytes)
        Add a mapping to the Castor mapping file for conversion between XML and Java beans.

        Parameters:
        mappingResourceName - Name of Castor mapping file
        mappingBytes - Mapping to add

      • beanToDocument

        public Document beanToDocument(Object value)
        Use Castor to convert a JavaBean to an XML Document, using the Castor mapping file.

        Parameters:
        value - JavaBean to convert
        Returns:
        XML document representing the JavaBean

      • beanToXmlString

        public String beanToXmlString(Object value)
        Use Castor to convert a JavaBean to an XML String, using the Castor mapping file.

        . The xml declaration is not included and namespaces are suppressed.
        Parameters:
        value - JavaBean to convert
        Returns:
        XML String representing the JavaBean

      • beanToXmlString

        public String beanToXmlString(Object value,
                              boolean includeXmlDeclaration)
        Use Castor to convert a JavaBean to an XML String, using the Castor mapping file.

        . Namespaces are suppressed.
        Parameters:
        value - JavaBean to convert
        includeXmlDeclaration - True = include XML header
        Returns:
        XML String representing the JavaBean

      • beanToXmlString

        public String beanToXmlString(Object value,
                              boolean includeXmlDeclaration,
                              boolean suppressNameSpaces)
        Use Castor to convert a JavaBean to an XML String, using the Castor mapping file.

        .
        Parameters:
        value - JavaBean to convert
        includeXmlDeclaration - True = include XML header
        suppressNameSpaces - True = don't include namespace declarations
        Returns:
        XML String representing the JavaBean

      • beanToXmlString

        public String beanToXmlString(Object value,
                              boolean includeXmlDeclaration,
                              boolean suppressNameSpaces,
                              boolean setSuppressXSIType)
        Use Castor to convert a JavaBean to an XML String, using the Castor mapping file.

        .
        Parameters:
        value - JavaBean to convert
        includeXmlDeclaration - True = include XML header
        suppressNameSpaces - True = don't include namespace declarations
        setSuppressXSIType - True = don't include xsi:type atribute
        Returns:
        XML String representing the JavaBean

      • domToBean

        public Object domToBean(Element element)
        Use Castor to convert an XML element to a JavaBean, using the Castor mapping file.

        .
        Parameters:
        element - XML element to convert
        Returns:
        JavaBean representing the XML element

      • xmlStringToBean

        public Object xmlStringToBean(String objectXml)
        Use Castor to convert an XML string to a JavaBean, using the Castor mapping file.

        .
        Parameters:
        objectXml - XML string to convert
        Returns:
        JavaBean representing the XML string

      • borrowMappingLoader

        public org.exolab.castor.mapping.MappingLoader borrowMappingLoader()
                                                            throws Exception
        Borrow a MappingLoader object from the pool. When finished using the object, return it using returnMappingLoader
        Returns:
        A MappingLoader to be used with a Marshaller or Unmarshaller
        Throws:
        Exception

      • returnMappingLoader

        public void returnMappingLoader(org.exolab.castor.mapping.MappingLoader mappingLoader)
        Return a MappingLoader object to the pool. The object will have been borrowed from the pool using borrowMappingLoader.
        Parameters:
        mappingLoader -

      • setMappingLoader

        public void setMappingLoader(org.exolab.castor.xml.Marshaller marshaller,
                             org.exolab.castor.mapping.MappingLoader mappingLoader)
                      throws Exception
        Set the mapping loaded to be used by the specified Marshaller. The mapping loader defines how to convert bewteen Siperian-defined beans and XML. Get a MappingLoader using borrowMappingLoader.
        Parameters:
        marshaller - A Marshaller to be used to convert beans to XML
        mappingLoader - The MappingLoader to use
        Throws:
        Exception

      • setMappingLoader

        public void setMappingLoader(org.exolab.castor.xml.Unmarshaller unmarshaller,
                             org.exolab.castor.mapping.MappingLoader mappingLoader)
                      throws Exception
        Set the mapping loader to be used by the specified Unmarshaller. The mapping loader defines how to convert bewteen Siperian-defined beans and XML. Get a MappingLoader using borrowMappingLoader.
        Parameters:
        unmarshaller - A Marshaller to be used to convert XML to beans
        mappingLoader - The MappingLoader to use
        Throws:
        Exception
